## removeDuplicates() function

creates list without duplicates from an original list, comparing using the default comparison operator, keeping only the first occurrence.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function removeDuplicates<T>(original: readonly T[]): T[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  original | <code>readonly T[]</code> | list to |

<b>Returns:</b>

`T[]`

new list without the duplicates present in the original
